name: Beauty Agent
description:
A 2D "special" horizontal version of the beauty girl shooting game. The heroine Ai belongs to a secret agent organization made up of women. Recently, the organization was attacked by evil forces, and a large number of agents were kidnapped. As the core combat member of the organization, Ai went deep into the enemy base alone to rescue his companions.
· Lovely female characters.
· 2D shooting mode.
· A variety of guns can be switched.
· Multi-direction grenade throwing system.
· Multiple types of enemies.
· Unique rescue mode.
· Levels that are both reactive and strategic.
